description: An ID that's unique for each checkin to Dujour.
name: message_id

description: Time the checkin to Dujour occurred.
name: timestamp

description: IP Address of node checking in to Dujour.
name: ip

description: The number of 'active' nodes reported by puppetdb. This is unique certnames that have not expired or been deactivated. [https://docs.puppet.com/puppetdb/4.4/api/metrics/v1/mbeans.html#population-metrics - num-nodes]
name: nodes

description: The name and version of the operating system on the puppet master.
name: os

description: A unique identifier for a site, derived as a hash of the CA certificate. Released in PE 2016.4.0
name: site_id

description: A unique identifier for a host, derived as a hash of the certname.
name: host_id

fields.description: Number of agents with that version.
fields.name: count

fields.description: Number of agents with that OS.
fields.name: count

description: List of agent platforms being managed.
name: agent_os

fields.description: Number of agents on that platform.
fields.name: count

description: List of agent cloud platforms being managed.
name: agent_cloud_platforms

fields.description: DEPRECATED, REPLACED BY 'module'. The module name
fields.name: name

fields.description: The count of nodes with this class applied
fields.name: nodes

description: List of module classes with the count of nodes each is applied to.
name: puppetserver_module_classes
